column4: for the love of god how to I install this please ? http://mir2.ovh.net/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/t/teamspeak-client/teamspeak-client_2.0.32-2_i386.deb on edgy ... teamspeak-client depends on libc6 (>= 2.5-0ubuntu1) \ Version of libc6 on system is 2.4-1ubuntu12.3. Thanks
you dont unless you get an older version
its made for the feisty version of libc6
no you would have to repackage it and change the depends. but it isnt in feisty that i can tell
